citations.narrative:
The facility installed a newly acquired piece of enrichment in the enclosure of one sugar glider named “Luna”. The
enrichment involved a platform with four chains that were connected to the top of the enclosure. Per the facility
representative, on 05/19/2023, Luna was found with her tail entangled in the chain of this enrichment. The injury that Luna
sustained from this entanglement required approximately half her tail to be amputated.
Enrichment and other items in the enclosure that cause entanglement or entrapment can lead to injury or even death. All
parts of the enclosure must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved.
All parts of the enclosure shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from
injury and to contain the animals.
To be corrected from this day (07/21/2023) forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
The facility installed a newly acquired piece of enrichment in the enclosure of one sugar glider named “Luna”. The 
enrichment involved a platform with four chains that were connected to the top of the enclosure. Per the facility 
representative, on 05/19/2023, Luna was found with her tail entangled in the chain of this enrichment. The injury that Luna 
sustained from this entanglement required approximately half her tail to be amputated.  
 
Enrichment and other items in the enclosure that cause entanglement or entrapment can lead to injury or even death. All 
parts of the enclosure must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. 
All parts of the enclosure shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from 
injury and to contain the animals. 
 
To be corrected from this day (07/21/2023) forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
